name: Astro Miner
description:
The objective of Astro Miner is to destroy asteroids and saucers. The player controls a Ship that can rotate left and right, fire shots and thrust forward.

Retro CRT style and 8 bit sounds

Heavily inspired / clone by the classic arcade game: Asteroids

Controls:

A/D : rotate

W : Thrust

Space or Mouse Left : Fire

Credits:

Font by Kenney : https://kenney.itch.io/

Retro CRT shader:  https://github.com/hiulit/Godot-3-2D-CRT-Shader
